data.text: @Richard28217619 Sure they could rent it. Not sure for how much though, that’s the normal problem
@Stevepeel63 Looks like an exotic picture postcard location, but could anyone legally own the land that property stands on, or even rent it?
@Stevepeel63 That's how Lanta looked like when I went there about 7 years ago. Impossible to make a deserted beach more deserted. Beautiful place. ✅👌
@Stevepeel63 cool, the scenery here is so beautiful
@Stevepeel63 @Ajarncom During our 7-day internment stay in Phuket, most of the island looks derelict. Some light activity down at Soi Bangla but everything else was just dead…
@khunhappy Why were you eating crabs on the rocks? 😊

@Stevepeel63 @Jon_Ringo With China being mostly shuttered and the Russian ruble in free fall, two of Thailand’s main tourism markets are basically gone. It’s going to affect numbers coming from Nordic countries too, with Russian airspace closed off.

@Stevepeel63 We had a few beers there December 2019. Lovely little place. I might have some pics somewhere of what it was like. It's really fallen into disrepair without maintenance. I'm sure it'll come back though.
